segments.text: This kitchen illustration catches my eye immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries a plate with gentle care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unaware, the sink spills water in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to see the puddle spread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot wets, but her face stays composed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy balances on the tilting stool up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's dipping into the cookie jar with glee.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below pleads with an open hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their teamwork is adorable in a risky way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window highlights the garden's order.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, hazards lurk unnoticed by the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the stool will hold much longer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies tempt, but danger overshadows the fun.
segments.speaker: PAR
